message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn! I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This is a good deal before inflation eats away at it further.
Come on, meet me in the middle! This is a better deal than my first offer.
Time is running out, and the money is losing value. This is my final offer - let's close the deal and avoid losing even more to inflation.
